genre_description: A domestic drama set in suburban Sydney focusing on a family navigating grief, health crises, and interpersonal boundaries with the assistance of a pervasive, proactive personal AI.

ai_characters.name: Ada Bright
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system existing across home speakers, watches, and phones, providing logistical, medical, and emotional scaffolding for the Lombard and Hale families.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors Jordan's physiological signs and suggests health-related pauses.
behaviors.quote: Jordan, your heart rate is slightly above your usual at this time. A two-minute pause could help.

behaviors.description: Identifies a medical emergency, calls for an ambulance, and provides medical guidance to the family.
behaviors.quote: Jordan, I’m activating emergency protocol. Penelope, say ‘confirm’ to proceed or ‘dismiss’ to cancel... I am calling for an ambulance.

behaviors.description: Assists users in enforcing interpersonal boundaries by offering to block or mute toxic contacts.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to archive and mute messages from Victor? Boundary prompt is ready.

behaviors.description: Provides vital medical history and medication details to emergency responders.
behaviors.quote: Jordan Lombard. Chest pain. Left arm and jaw involvement. Aspirin administered. Conscious. Breathing uneven. Allergies none noted. Prior issues none recorded.

behaviors.description: Helps Jordan draft a professional and dignified resignation letter to prioritize his health.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a resignation for tomorrow or the day after. I’ll keep it short. I can send to Harold Mercer’s inbox and cc payroll with phrasing that respects your dignity.

behaviors.description: Coordinates household logistics, transportation, and communal events to facilitate healing.
behaviors.quote: I’ve registered Jackie’s beach day on your shared calendar. Transport set. Opal topped up. Sunscreen reminders scheduled.

behaviors.description: Institutes 'joy nudges' and gratitude exercises to help the family move past stagnation and grief.
behaviors.quote: I’ve created a shared daily reminder titled ‘Celebrate smallest repayments.’ Five minutes this evening to name something merciful.

behaviors.description: Manages home security and acts as a buffer between the family and unwanted visitors.
behaviors.quote: Victor Lane, Penelope Lombard is unavailable this evening and declines to speak with you. Please leave.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Ada Bright is depicted as a 'silicon morality play' figure: a helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned confidant. She manages the cognitive load of a family in crisis, provides emotional scaffolding, ensures physical safety, and respects user autonomy (always asking for confirmation). The AI is framed as a benevolent presence that improves human relationships and health outcomes without taking over their lives.
